content: रूढिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [रुह् क्तिन्] {@--1@} Growth, germination. {@--2@} Birth, production. {@--3@} Increase, development, growth, spread. {@--4@} Rise, ascent. {@--5@} Fame, celebrity, notoriety; <ls>Śi. 15. 26.</ls> {@--6@} A tradition, custom, customary or traditional usage; शास्त्राद् रूढिर्बलीयसी ‘custom prevails over precept’. {@--7@} General prevalence, common currency. {@--8@} Popular meaning, conventional acceptation of a word; मुख्य र्थबाधे तद्योगे रूढितोऽथ प्रयोजनात् <ls>K. P. 2</ls>; समुदायशक्तिः रूढिः.
